issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Pass slices instead of Vec in DataFrame API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11401](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11401). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This makes the API a bit more ergonomic, and more Rusty, saving some allocations as well.

comments.body:
